DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Lidocaine Post-Tonsillectomy Pain Pediatric Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether give lidocaine intravenously tonsillectomy surgery effective decrease postoperative pain compare placebo . Participants one two arm . Those Arm 1 receive lidocaine bolus infusion throughout initial recovery period Arm 2 receive equal volume normal saline . Subjects monitor assessed pain time hospital follow home week surgery . Primary outcomes measure pain . Secondary outcome measure include pain medication use , emergence delirium , incidence laryngospasm , side effect .
